title: November
description: COUNTDOWN It's 1999. Plagues. Curses. Hunger. The Pilgrims sure had it easy.NOVEMBERFinally, there's something to be thankful for. The Demon has been vanquished. No more death, destruction, or devastation. Only relief, restoration, and renewal.That is, if you ignore a couple of minor details.The countdown is still going strong......and the Demon could be, too.
author: Daniel Parker
